name: Silent Eyes
description:
This game is all about the relationship of silence, darkness and fear.

You wake up, blind, in a dark cave - the only way to escape is to perceive your surroundings through making a sound. Now you just have to climb up the ladder and your freeeee. But wait... where is this noise coming from, is there anyone with you?!

Controls

Move - WASD
Make a sound - SPACE


Credits

Art by GitemConceptArt (Sampson Russell)
